F

FileAuthenticationHandler - Class in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic
Class designed to read data from a file in the format of USERNAME SEPARATOR PASSWORD that will go line by line and look for the username.
FileAuthenticationHandler() - Constructor for class org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic.FileAuthenticationHandler
 

O

org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic - package org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic
 

R

RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler - Class in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic
AuthenticationHandler which fails to authenticate a user purporting to be one of the blocked usernames, and blindly authenticates all other users.
RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler() - Constructor for class org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic.RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler

setUsers(List<String>) - Method in class org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic.RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler
Set the Collection of usernames which we will fail to authenticate.
